member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.Workspace.Contract.CoverageTreeQuickSearch.QuickSearchResult.ParentIds

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.Workspace.Impl.CoverageTree.Model.Interface.IRawMetadataBasedCoverageTreeTraverser
member.summary: Raw (without additional processing of type members) metadata-based coverage tree traverser. Construct transient coverage tree on demand, each time from the scratch.

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.Workspace.Impl.Reporting.Html.FileExistanceAnalyzer
member.summary:
Checking for file existance takes about 10ms. In ReSharper snapshot we have info about 15000 files. This means that total time consumption for this operation is about 2 minutes.
This class is introduced to minimize number of checks where possible (e.g. if source files are unavailable)
